channel.title: Freebsd on Le Baron de Charlus
channel.description: Recent content in Freebsd on Le Baron de Charlus

item.title: Freebsd Pci Disk Space
item.description: When you create an OVH Public Cloud instance under Freebsd with a certain amount of disk space, let’s say 50G, you will find that it is not applied on your partition. First let’s look at what we have: # gpart show => 40 10239920 da0 GPT (50G) [CORRUPT] 40 1024 1 freebsd-boot (512K) 1064 984 - free - (492K) 2048 10235904 2 freebsd-zfs (4.9G) 10237952 2008 - free - (1.0M) We note that our volume da0 is tagged as CORRUPT.
